column6: "FORGING THE SWORD" PART 2 (OF 6) Professor Charles Xavier - legendary founder of the X-Men, and the man who dreams of peaceful coexistence between humans and mutants - has come to Genosha with one intention: to rebuild a nation from its ashes.
column8: | inker:Greg Adams | writer:Chris Claremont | colorist:Liquid Graphics | penciller:Igor Kordey | penciller (cover):Andy Park
